meta.title: Samantha J. Brown | Fullstack Developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing fullstack development work and UX design skills

about.bio: I am a fullstack developer with expertise in Java, JavaScript, React, and UX design. I have experience collaborating with cross-functional teams to optimize user experiences and develop interactive applications. Currently pursuing a dual major in Interaction Design and Computer Science with a 3.80 GPA.
focus: Developing fullstack web applications with modern technologies
Creating intuitive user experiences through UX design principles
Leading design and development projects in academic and professional settings

experience.title: User Experience Designer
experience.description: Collaborated with software developers and marketers to optimize the app's user experience. Led UX design efforts, creating application prototypes and developing interactive webpages. Additionally, contributed to branding and investor presentations.
achievements: Led UX design efforts for mobile application optimization
Created application prototypes and interactive webpages
Contributed to branding and investor presentations

experience.title: Campus Organizations Leadership
experience.description: Human Computer Interaction President, Computer Science Association Vice President, and Vega Honor Society PR. Organized workshops and events focused on UX/UI design, Computer Science and graphic design skills. Creator and lead Graphic Designer of SUNY Oswego's annual Hackathon: LakerHacks.
achievements: Organized workshops and events for UX/UI design and Computer Science
Created and led graphic design for LakerHacks annual hackathon
Served in leadership roles across multiple organizations
Developed strong organizational and event management skills

experience.title: Admissions Representative
experience.company: State University of New York at Oswego
experience.description: Strengthened communication and public speaking skills by leading tours and presenting at events; handled office tasks including scheduling, data entry, and phone support.
achievements: Led campus tours and presented at recruitment events
Developed strong communication and public speaking skills
Managed office tasks including scheduling and data entry
Provided excellent phone support to prospective students

education.degree: B.S. in Interaction Design and Computer Science (Dual Major)
education.institution: State University of New York at Oswego
education.description: Gained hands-on experience in UX/UI design, front-end development, and human-computer interaction, developing skills in wireframing, prototyping, and coding. Worked on team projects to design user interfaces and implement functional applications while maintaining a high GPA. Actively participated in clubs focused on design and development projects. Early graduate.
Earned the equivalent of an Associates Degree through High School Dual Credit and Summer classes, including digital design based courses.
